segments.text: Steven , have a rest . Could you have a talk with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ! What can I do for you , Madam ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Janice has just got sick and I need a hand now . Could you come here earlier tomorrow morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When do you want me to come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me think . About half past seven if it is okay for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . I can make it .
segments.speaker: S2
